Plasma_Blast.display_help: The GhoulX soldier's gauntlets are capable of firing potent plasma energy attacks at their foes which strike with enough force to sometimes knock a foe off their feet.
Plasma_Blast.display_target_help: The GhoulX soldier's gauntlets are capable of firing potent plasma energy attacks at their foes which strike with enough force to sometimes knock a foe off their feet.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Plasma_Spray.display_help: The GhoulX soldier can concentrate a large amount of plasma and release it in a staggering blast of energy capable of both knocking down foes and dealing moderate damage.
Plasma_Spray.display_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown
Plasma_Spray.display_target_help: The GhoulX soldier can concentrate a large amount of plasma and release it in a staggering blast of energy capable of both knocking down foes and dealing moderate damage.
Plasma_Spray.display_target_short_help: Ranged Cone, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown

Punch.display_help: A Super Strength Punch is a powerful pummeling attack, and it may knock foes off their feet.
